articles.description: Interim England boss Lee Carsley says the Three Lions need "to make sure we get the job done" and beat the Republic of Ireland to earn promotion in the Nations League.
articles.title: England v Republic of Ireland: Lee Carsley wants England to 'get job done' and win group

articles.description: Follow live radio and text commentary as Wales host Australia at the Principality Stadium in the autumn internationals.
articles.title: Autumn Nations Series LIVE: Wales vs Australia - radio commentary, latest score & text updates

articles.description: Watch Red Button coverage and follow live text commentary as Great Britain play Canada in the quarter-finals of the Billie Jean King Cup in Malaga, Spain.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup LIVE: GB v Canada in quarter-final - watch stream & follow text updates

articles.description: Follow live radio commentary and text updates as Aston Villa host Crystal Palace plus two other matches featuring the Merseyside Derby and Leicester City v Manchester United.
articles.title: WSL LIVE: Build-up to Aston Villa v Crystal Palace plus two other matches - radio & live text

articles.description: England have lost again but they should not be criticised for their endeavour and playing style, writes Matt Dawson.
articles.title: Matt Dawson column: I am reluctant to criticise England but change is needed

articles.description: Luke Littler takes on Gary Anderson and Mickey Mansell plays Martin Lukema for a place in the final of the Grand Slam of Darts in Wolverhampton - follow live text commentary.
articles.title: Grand Slam of Darts semi-finals LIVE: Luke Littler vs Gary Anderson & Mickey Mansell vs Martin Lukeman - live updates & scores

articles.description: Rory McIlroy holds off Denmark's Rasmus Hojgaard to win the season-ending DP World Tour Championship and clinch his sixth Race to Dubai title.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy wins DP World Tour Championship final & Race to Dubai

articles.description: Hungary coach Adam Szalai is 'doing well' after being rushed to hospital during his side's Nations League match against Netherlands.
articles.title: Adam Szalai: Hungary coach 'doing well' after collapsing during Netherlands match

articles.description: Jon Jones says he channeled legendary martial artist Bruce Lee to beat Stipe Miocic at UFC 309 at New York's Madison Square Garden.
articles.title: UFC 309 Jones vs Miocic: How enigmatic Jon Jones channelled Bruce Lee to retain title

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the statistics behind Rafael Nadal's success as the 22-time Grand Slam champion prepares for his final tournament.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal: The King of Clay's career in numbers
